item.title: Topic Index
item.description: The following is a list of topics and skills covered during the semester. This will grow as we progress through the coursework. If you have additions or suggestions, please let Chris know! A-D Data Open data (Preview Week, Week 1) Data analysis Opionated analysis development (Preview Week) E-H I-L Literate programming (Week 1) M-P Q-T R Ngiotebooks (Week 1) R Projects (Week 1) Reproducibility (Preview Week) U-Z
